ICS
It's the Waves and Wheels Weekend! Join us June 6th and 7th for a rockin' 80's party and a Fun Run! This wonderful weekend will benefit the Suncoast Charities for Children!
June 6th is the Rockin' 80's Party with High Hands & Hair Bands! There will be tons of fun with Casino games, Prizes for the best 80's outfit and music by DJ Craze!
June 7th is the Boat, Car, and Motorcycle Fun Run starting at Marina Jack! Prizes for the top 5 winners!
